title: Looking for a substitute
body: We are looking for one more last substitute that will be able to play in the OOL Tournament with the team and when needed, The substitute can fill top, jg or sup, any rank is able to join, just add me on league, IGN is JT BBE, and ill accept it and let u know asap, thanks :D

replies.body:
sounds like ur ready for some silver skills
XD
